entries.content:
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8.2)

project (top_impl_Instance C)

add_definitions(-DCAMKES)

includeGlobalComponents()

DeclareCAmkESComponent(source_thread_impl
  SOURCES components/source_thread_impl//src/source.c components/source_thread_impl/src/sb_source_thread_impl.c
  INCLUDES components/source_thread_impl/includes/ includes

)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(destination_thread_impl
  SOURCES components/destination_thread_impl//src/destination.c components/destination_thread_impl/src/sb_destination_thread_impl.c
  INCLUDES components/destination_thread_impl/includes/ includes

)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(dispatch_periodic
  SOURCES components/dispatch_periodic/src/sb_dispatch_periodic.c
  INCLUDES includes

)

DeclareCAmkESComponent(sb_destination_thread_component_read_port_Monitor
  SOURCES components/sb_Monitors/sb_destination_thread_component_read_port_Monitor/src/sb_destination_thread_component_read_port_Monitor.c
  INCLUDES components/sb_Monitors/sb_destination_thread_component_read_port_Monitor/includes/ includes

)

DeclareCAmkESRootserver(top_impl_Instance.camkes)

#!/usr/bin/env bash

set -e

export SCRIPT_HOME=$( cd "$( dirname "$0" )" &> /dev/null && pwd )
export PROJECT_HOME=$( cd "$( dirname "$0" )/.." &> /dev/null && pwd )
cd ${PROJECT_HOME}


# location of camkes-projects directory
if [ -n "$1" ]; then
    CAMKES_DIR=$1
elif [ -d "/host/camkes-project" ]; then
    CAMKES_DIR="/host/camkes-project"
elif [ -d "${HOME}/CASE/camkes" ]; then
    CAMKES_DIR="${HOME}/CASE/camkes"
fi

if [[ -z "$CAMKES_DIR" || ! -d "${CAMKES_DIR}" ]]; then
    echo "Directory '${CAMKES_DIR}' does not exist.  Please specify the location of your CAmkES project directory"
    exit -1
fi


# use the directory name for the CAmkES apps directory name 
HAMR_CAMKES_PROJ=${PWD##*/}


CAMKES_APPS_DIR=$CAMKES_DIR/projects/camkes/apps/$HAMR_CAMKES_PROJ

# create a sym-link to the project in the CAmkES app directory
if [ ! -e "${CAMKES_APPS_DIR}" ]; then
    ln -sv $PROJECT_HOME $CAMKES_APPS_DIR
fi


########################
# run CAmkES/seL4 build
########################

cd $CAMKES_DIR

BUILD_DIR=build_$HAMR_CAMKES_PROJ

rm -rf $BUILD_DIR
mkdir $BUILD_DIR
cd $BUILD_DIR

../init-build.sh -DCAMKES_APP=$HAMR_CAMKES_PROJ && ninja

########################
# simulate via QEMU
########################

./simulate

#ifndef __SB_AADL_sb_types__H
#define __SB_AADL_sb_types__H

#include <stdbool.h>
#include <stdint.h>

#ifndef SB_VERIFY
#include <stddef.h>
#endif // SB_VERIFY

#define __SB_OS_CAMKES__

#ifndef SB_VERIFY
#define MUTEXOP(OP)\
if((OP) != 0) {\
  fprintf(stderr,"Operation " #OP " failed in %s at %d.\n",__FILE__,__LINE__);\
  *((int*)0)=0xdeadbeef;\
}
#else
#define MUTEXOP(OP) OP
#endif // SB_VERIFY
#ifndef SB_VERIFY
#define CALLBACKOP(OP)\
if((OP) != 0) {\
  fprintf(stderr,"Operation " #OP " failed in %s at %d.\n",__FILE__,__LINE__);\
  *((int*)0)=0xdeadbeef;\
}
#else
#define CALLBACKOP(OP) OP
#endif // SB_VERIFY


#endif // __SB_AADL_sb_types__H
